channel.title: Passport.js :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Authentication Libraries There are many different authentication libraries and methods available for Node.js and Express. For this project, we will use the Passport.js library. It supports many different authentication methods, and is a very common way that authentication is handled within JavaScript applications. So, to begin, letâ€™s install both passport and the passport-cas plugin: $
